answers.answer: How far along are you? congratulations
Wow! & how many wkss were you? Congratulations so glad u & the bby r doing good! :)

Thank you I was 35 weeks and 5 days when I had him! He is in the NICU unfortunately but hopefully he will be able to come home soon! He can't keep his blood sugar high enough and at his age they use alot of energy to tell you they are hungry then are too tired to eat.

question: I was told my baby was not growing the way he should have been. Went to the ER a few days later then they told me I had Miled preeclampsia. Then two days later my midwife and I were deciding on a date to induce me we decided the 20th would be good. She stepped out of the room for a few minutes came back and told me the plan was changing and I was to be induced that day (12/11) soo I went home got a few things and went back. I got there and they started my induction! I really wanted to go natural but all of the nurses kept telling me I wasn't in active labor and I would probably not deliver until (12/13) I was dialed to a 5 but the monitor was not picking up my contractions. Soo I got the epidural (it only worked in my right leg I could feel everything else) they broke my water and tried to fix my epidural I was still at a 5 thenn an hour later the pain was terrible so the doctor came and checked me. I was at a ten but they didn't think I was ready to push. But I insisted I atleast try. I pushed once the doc shook her head saying it wasn't time yet cause he was not low enough I pushed a second time then they started to get things ready haha 3 sets of pushes and my beautiful baby boy Armani was born!! 4 pounds 6 ounces and  18 inches long! The most amazing thing that ever happened to me!! I only needed two stiches!
title: labor story!!
